Good Comments: They did good work. Very clean and good font choice.
they really did a great work and with detail in it as well
Bad Comments: Not sure why people are saying the translations are accurate. There are many mistakes and they don't know how to romanized. コンクール should not be translated as concours, but as competition, or musical competition.
The only ones who cared about being precise and finishing. Wonderful subs!
Very easy font and color and it looked very professional.
timing was great and the translations were accurate
Clear, easy to read subs that are up long enough to read.

Subbed Projects.Show Name: Kiniro no Corda: Primo Passo - Hitonatsu no Encore

Good Comments: Good quality, and only subs there are.
Bad Comments: Excellent spelling, timing and very helpful references.
because i like them on how they dubbed the episodes

Subbed Projects.Show Name: Koisuru Tenshi Angelique: Kagayaki no Ashita
Koisuru Tenshi Angelique: Kagayaki no Ashita Special
Koisuru Tenshi Angelique: Kokoro no Mezameru Toki

Good Comments: Nice set of subs overall. Excellent translation, editing, encoding and typesetting. Another job well done by SMS.
Overall, a satisfying package by SMS. Minor grammar mistakes that can be overlooked, with editing that seems to flow well and excellent typesetting.
Overall good. Slightly annoying karaoke subs, though.
Strawberry Mint Subs does an awesome job of subbing Neo Angelique Abyss.  I like the color and style of the subtitles.  I like how they translate certain words.
Well, it's nice someone's subbing it.
Their subbing is pretty accurate, and the video quality is great. Their only flaw is how slowly they put out new episodes. ^^;
Bad Comments: good quality and good subbing, but they are tooo slow

Good Comments: Wonderful work. Nothing to complain about.
Nice typesetting. Great quality. No mistakes.
Did a fine job, too bad the anime itself sucks.
Bad Comments: There's really not anything to complain about, aside from the long release date of the subs for the final four episodes. However, the translator has a legitimate reason, and has released a statement regarding this.
Lack of cropping is a minor annoyance. Translation accuracy and handle of the English language is a huge plus. Superior subs.
Clean subs. Only minus is that they don't encode... could be quarter the size with same quality.
Not subbing final episodes 23-26 long after air date

Good Comments: They are great subbers... Shame they only release .mkv for this anime
Dropped was doing a good job too.
they subbed most of my favorite animes... love them... thanks
Bad Comments: It doesn't finished the anime I was seeing... Really disappointing
could have been good if they didn't drop it!
Pretty nice subs, not much to complain about. And just fyi, they release translations in both .mkv and .avi formats.
